name: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation
description: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation is a leading provider of information technology, consulting, and business process services. Founded in 1994, Cognizant has grown to become one of the largest and most respected technology firms in the world, offering a wide range of services to clients across various industries, including financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, and technology. The company leverages its deep industry expertise and innovative technology solutions to help clients navigate their digital transformation journeys. Cognizant’s services include digital strategy, data analytics, IT infrastructure services, application development, and enterprise modernization. With a strong emphasis on customer-centricity, Cognizant aims to deliver measurable business outcomes by combining technology with domain knowledge. The company is headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, and operates in more than 40 countries, employing over 300,000 professionals worldwide. Cognizant is committed to sustainability and corporate social responsibility, continuously seeking ways to make a positive impact on the communities it serves. Its mission is to help clients succeed by providing end-to-end technology solutions that enhance operational efficiency and drive innovation.

seo.meta_title: Cognizant Technology Solutions | IT Services and Consulting
seo.meta_description: Explore Cognizant Technology Solutions, a global leader in IT services and consulting. Discover how Cognizant helps businesses elevate their digital capabilities and drive transformation.

faq.question: What services does Cognizant provide?
faq.answer: Cognizant provides IT services, consulting, and business process services across various industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cognizant?
faq.answer: Brian Humphries is the CEO of Cognizant Technology Solutions.

faq.question: Where is Cognizant headquartered?
faq.answer: Cognizant is headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, USA.
